title: Boku no Hero Academia: Ikinokore! Kesshi no Survival Kunren
synopsis: In this brand-new adventure, some Class 1-A students are sent to hone their survival skills at a training course. Having yet to receive their provisional licenses, they're eager to cut loose and have a little fun.
